docs.lead_paragraph: AMEN. For the benefit of all concerned it is made known that the "Amen Corner" was so named because it if the gathering spot in the Fifth Avenue Hotel corridor of those who talK politics, music, religion, poetry, art, political economy statesmanship, office seeking foreign and domestic finance, international law, constitutional law, police court law, civil district law, the quality of cigars, the quality and effect of stimulants, club life, the idiosyncrasies of the Mugwump.
